Token.Abstract: KCSResourceStore loads, creates/updates, and deletes blob resources from the Kinvey backend @deprecatedIn 1.18.0
Add or update an object (or objects) in the store.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: A url to a file to add/update in the resources (if the object is a NSArray, all objects will be added/updated). The object must be a NSURL that points a local file, or a NSArray of such NSURL objects.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: A block that gets invoked when the addition/update is "complete" (as defined by the store)

Parameter.Name: progressBlock
Parameter.Abstract:
A block that is invoked whenever the store can offer an update on the progress of the operation.
@deprecatedIn 1.18.0

Token.Abstract: Query or fetch an resource (or resource) in the store.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: A block that gets invoked when the query/fetch is "complete".

Parameter.Name: progressBlock
Parameter.Abstract: A block that is invoked whenever the store can offer an update on the progress of the operation. @deprecatedIn 1.18.0
